label: logicC:history_en
steps: [1] If the 1929 stock market crash occurred, then the Great Depression began.
[2] If the Great Depression began, then mass unemployment followed.
[3] If mass unemployment occurred and the New Deal was enacted, then the U.S. economy was significantly restructured.
[6] For every program x, if x was a New Deal program, then x was federally administered.
[7] The Civilian Conservation Corps was a New Deal program.
[8] For every program x, if x was federally administered, then x focused on either relief or reform.
[11] The U.S. economy was significantly restructured (from [3] and [10] and [4]).
[12] The Civilian Conservation Corps was federally administered and focused on either relief or reform (from [6] and [7] and [8]).
